ETYMOLOGY: Compound of 'class' (referring to a group of students taught together) and 'mate' (a companion or fellow).

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A person who is a member of the same class or course of study at a school, college, or university as another.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She invited all her classmates to her birthday party.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她邀请了她所有的同班同学参加她的生日派对。
